nodes.bodyText: Does this initAndRun get called only for Gradle build? In which case this change looks good. The reason why the ProcessUtil has been conditionally used is to avoid streaming the STDOUT and STDERR when Maven tool is being used and instead just rely on inheriting IO. So as long as this gets called only for Gradle, the change looks fine to me.
Yes, I ran a search on all the project and this is only used by gradle. Maven OTOH, uses the init and the trigger method.

At the beginning named it like that. But after updating the ProcessUtil class from:
public static Process launchProcess(final ProcessBuilder builder, final Optional<ProcessInheritIODisabled> processInheritIODisabled)

to have this method signature:
public static Process launchProcess(final ProcessBuilder builder, final boolean shouldRedirectIO)

calling this method from the native build step wth a ProcessInheritIODisabled would have give something like :
launch(p, !processInheritIODisabled.isPresent())

So I preferred moving the negation in the launchProcess method.
